mapper.select: SELECT post.*, user.nickname, user.thumbnail, user.user_rate FROM goguma_post AS post JOIN goguma_user AS user WHERE post.uid=user.uid ORDER BY pid DESC
SELECT post.*, user.nickname, user.thumbnail, user.user_rate FROM goguma_post AS post JOIN goguma_user AS user WHERE pid=#{pid} AND post.uid=user.uid

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goguma_post (uid, selected_uid, loca_gu, loca_dong, post_title, post_photo, post_content, post_category, post_price, user_list, report_cnt) VALUES (#{uid}, #{selected_uid}, #{loca_gu}, #{loca_dong}, #{post_title}, #{post_photo}, #{post_content}, #{post_category}, #{post_price}, #{user_list}, #{report_cnt})
